column1: #Text=Chef says : " Tonight , for your dining pleasure , I present a seared wild Kyoshi elephant koi , paired with a ginger - infused pea tendril and hibiscus root salad . "
#Text=Baatar says : " Sorry , dear , I 'm going to have to take dinner to my office .
#Text=" Suyin says : " That was my brilliant architect of a husband , Baatar , and our oldest son .
#Text=" Lin says : " Yeah , mom used to say that too , but she never meant it .
#Text=I have to admit , I was pretty skeptical when he said " pea tendrils " , but this is delicious .
#Text=I do n't think I 've ever had a bad meal in my life .
#Text=I had plenty when Mako and I were living in the streets .
#Text=I mean , you 'd be surprised how bad food from a dumpster can be .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , no , it 's okay , that 's all in the past .
#Text=I got to be a pro-bender , fought against a dangerous revolution , became a mover star , and now , I 'm helping the Avatar rebuild a whole nation .
#Text=" Suyin says : " How 's your search for the new airbenders going ?
#Text=We had to rescue a whole group of them from the Earth Queen .
#Text=She thinks she can just do whatever she wants .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I mean , the idea of even having a queen is so outdated .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ... I have n't really thought about it too much .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Well , you should start .
#Text=The world is evolving and the Earth Queen can evolve with it or step aside .
#Text=My little sister is an expert on world affairs now .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You want to talk about what 's really bugging you ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Sorry we 're late , everyone .
#Text=" Asami says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=I mean , what are any of us doing here ?
#Text=" Asami says : " You mean my company .
#Text=Future Industries reverted back to me after you plotted to abduct the President .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Allegedly plotted to abduct the President .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , that 's because you escaped prison .
#Text=" Varrick says : " No , the universe decided to set me free .
#Text=So , I looked up my old friend Suyin here , pitched her a few ideas , and bam !
#Text=" Suyin says : " Varrick 's heading up my new technology division .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I 've seen the future , and the future is , magnets !
#Text=I 'm working on a high speed rail that would revolutionize transportation and shipping as we know it .
#Text=But that 's not all , I 'm - " Lin says : " All right , enough !
#Text=I 'm trying to keep the Avatar safe and you 're harboring a criminal ?
#Text=Sure Varrick 's made a few mistakes in his past , but that does n't mean he should pay for it for the rest of his life .
#Text=My chef was a pirate , but now he 's a culinary master .
#Text=" Mako says : " So , you and Opal seemed to hit it off dinner .
#Text=She 's sweet and pretty and super nice .
#Text=Your type is dumb mover star or psycho ice princess .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You know , that really hurts a little bit .
